desc: With over two decades of fashion experience, Penelope understands styles, fabrics, fit, and seasonal trends. Through her detailed workshops, online courses, and monthly membership - Penelope is inspiring women all over Australia and NZ to build wardrobes they wear - and LOVE!

layout.text: INSPIRING WOMEN TO BE THEIR OWN STYLIST.
My super power? Helping women create fabulous forever wardrobes! To love what they own, know how to style it, and shop smarter...
